title: Hello! I'm Saman
subtitle: Full Stack Dev | Open-Source Enthusiast | Gamer

items.content: I am Saman and i am a computer engineering graduate and i love codding.
items.about: Junior level programmer, document analyst, and developer advocate with experience in full-stack work across multiple technologies .
items.more: Very flexible, fast learner, proven ability to adapt to new technologies.
items.once: I readily adapt to new environments and enthusiastically take on new responsibilities and challenges.  Additionally,
items.onceMore: I am equally effective in team-oriented and self-driven professional environments.
items.last: I am confident that I could be a valuable asset to your firm, and look forward to interviewing with you in the near future
items.finall: so that I may have the opportunity to prove this to you in person.
